email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Shipment of 10,000MT Wheat from Houston to Rotterdam
email_chain.body: Dear Lisa, We are looking to ship 10,000MT of wheat from Houston to Rotterdam in November. Could you provide us with a freight rate and vessel availability? Best regards, John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Shipment of 10,000MT Wheat from Houston to Rotterdam
email_chain.body: Hi John, Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel MV SEA HORIZON, which is available for a laycan of November 10-15. The starting freight rate is $50/MT on a CFR basis. Please let me know if this works for you. Best, Lisa

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Shipment of 10,000MT Wheat from Houston to Rotterdam
email_chain.body: Hi Lisa, Thank you for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the rate seems a bit high. Could you consider $45/MT? Best regards, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Shipment of 10,000MT Wheat from Houston to Rotterdam
email_chain.body: Hi John, After discussing with the owners, we can offer a revised rate of $47/MT. This is our best offer given the current market conditions. Please confirm if this is acceptable. Best, Lisa

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Shipment of 10,000MT Wheat from Houston to Rotterdam
email_chain.body: Hi Lisa, We accept the revised rate of $47/MT. Please proceed with the booking and send us the contract details. Best regards, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Shipment of 10,000MT Wheat from Houston to Rotterdam
email_chain.body: Hi John, Thank you for your confirmation. I will send the contract details shortly. The vessel MV SEA HORIZON is confirmed for a laycan of November 10-15. Best, Lisa
